评论详情: This regulates my body heat well.  It has helped to keep me warm and comfortable. The fabric is soft and breathable.  I haven't had any fabric piling, which is refreshing.  I like the elastic around the ankles, it isn't too tight. The color is also exactly what it looks like in the photos.

评论概述: The matching set you didn't know you needed
评论详情: I am typically not a set girlie because I am tall so the pants are usually a lot shorter than what I like!  BUT!  This set has been absolutely incredible for this tall girl (I'm 5'9").  The fabric is so soft and comfy.  The elastic ankles are super tight and still can move easily.  They are long enough that they don't feel like floods.  Both the top and bottom wash super well and I just hang dry to help prevent any shrinkage.  The sleeves are long on the top and the neckline is at the perfect left.  Not feeling like you're hanging out but not feeling like you're being choked either.  When I tell you I wear this as much as humanly possible, I'm not lying.
Pretty color, soft and comfy.  I ordered a large. I’m between a medium and large… fits great

This set is cute and cozy!  Like it says in the listing, it is great for travel!  It’s made of a medium weight ribbed knit material that is soft and comfortable to have on your body.  It fits true to size for an oversized fit based on the size chart.  The pants have an elastic waistband and have deep pockets.  The shirt is long and can be tucked if that’s your style, it has a pocket on the front, and the sleeves are perfectly long.  I’ve worn this as a complete set many times, but I’ve also worn the shirt with jeans and leggings.  This set washes and dries very well and looks new after being worn, washed, and dried multiple times.  Great buy!!
I’m 5 feet, 115 lbs and this fit perfect. It’s so comfortable!  I’d like to have one in every color!

This is a cute set for fall. I ordered my typical size S and it is true to size. The pants come with a drawstring adjustable closure and front side pockets. The top is a L/S relaxed style with a front pocket. The fabric is a very soft waffle weave poly blend. This has lots of stretch and movement. Perfect for lounging around. I would say this is more of a pajama style set than a "jogger" as noted in the description and I would definitely wear this around the house but not take it to the streets - lol!

I ordered a 2X, which is what I normally wear, and the bottoms fit just right, so I washed but hung dried.  The top, however, was huge, so I I washed and dried in the dryer, and it now fits just right as well.  I probably won't be wearing this outside my home, so it's a nice, comfy outfit for those lazy, stay home days. I have larger than normal calves, and the ribbing on the bottom of the pants is not too tight, which I appreciate.  It feels and looks to be well made with no loose threads.  I got the black set, and it is a nice, deep black.  Overall, very happy with it and would recommend.
Very good material and fits true to size

.Two piece jogger pants and top.  Matching color top and bottom.  Fits as expected.  Comfortable loose not oversized fit.

Super comfortable, streatchy. Fits true to size. Breathable material. Great for fall. Love the style and how big the pockets are!

I have entered my Matching Loungewear era and this set is here for me! The material is soft and substantial, but not so thick I'll sweat and pass out with heat exhaustion from a hot flash (also in that era, I'm afraid.) The stripes woven into the fabric add textured stripes that are very forgiving for any, how shall I put it? Tushy dimples. I'm a size 10 petite and the medium fit perfectly, not too baggy not too tight and, most importantly, not too long. The pockets are large and neither the neckline nor the cuffs are constricting. They are well made and, honestly, I can't find anything wrong with them (and I looked!)  They look just like the photos --I was a bit concerned since there were no photos of the set from behind butt they fit back there just fine (see what I did there?) Mom jokes aside: these are a great set at a good price!

I love everything about this outfit!  It's very well made, and the size is perfect.  The color is beautiful.  (I got the bean green.)  It is very comfortable.  The pants have an elastic waist and a drawstring.  The pants have pockets and cuffs at the ankles.  The sleeves are cuffed and are a good length.  Washes beautifully.  Definitely recommend!

评论概述: Perfect Lounge Set for Comfort and Style
评论详情: The KIRUNDO Women’s Fall 2 Piece Lounge Set is very comfortable, stylish, and well-made.  The material is soft and good weight, and it doesn’t shrink after washing, which is a huge plus.  The fit is true to size, though if you’re between sizes, you might want to consider sizing down.  I love how versatile this set is; it’s perfect for lounging at home but also works great for casual outings.  The Bean Green color is amazing and adds a nice touch to the overall look.  Overall, this lounge set offers the perfect combination of comfort, quality, and style.  Highly recommend!

评论概述: Cozy, Stylish, and Perfect for Lounging!
评论详情: The KIRUNDO Women's Fall 2 Piece Lounge Set in Bean Green has quickly become my go-to outfit for relaxing at home. The ribbed knit material is incredibly soft and comfortable, making it perfect for those cozy days in. The long sleeve pullover pairs perfectly with the drawstring jogger pants, offering both comfort and style in one set.  The fit is true to size, and the elastic waistband with a drawstring on the pants ensures a snug yet comfortable fit. The Bean Green color is a lovely, muted tone that’s both stylish and easy to wear. This tracksuit set is not only great for lounging but also works well for casual outings when paired with sneakers.  Overall, this lounge set offers the perfect balance of comfort and style. If you’re looking for something that’s both cozy and fashionable for the fall season, I highly recommend this set!

What a comfortable outfit! Ordered this in the small in the bean green and the color is beautiful. It gives me all the fall vibes. The small top fits perfectly. I'm 5'6 so finding outfits in small, where the legs go all the way down to the ankle, not my midcalf, is a challenge. But these pants fit beautifully. The stitching line on the top right shoulder is a bit weird but I think it's suppose to come like that? After washing and drying, it didn't snag, shrink or pill. The fabric is lightweight yet soft and warm. I can't wait to wear this during a fall, rainy day. Absolutely love this fit. Highly recommend

I think I found my new favorite lounge set! First impression when I pulled it out of the packaging was how heavy it felt. Yet it feels so silky smooth and lightweight between the fingers. I’m usually in between a M and L and figured I’d size up since it’s loungewear and I’m so glad I did. I’m sure the medium would’ve been just fine, but I love the look and comfort of sizing up. Once fall comes, I know I’ll be in this nonstop!

I am typically between a large and an XL and I ordered the XL - I wish I would have gone with the large. This set is so roomy, and comfy and oversized. Easy to dress up or down. The material is fantastic, it is a bit thicker which is nice for fall and winter! It is very warm, and comfortable, and great quality. If you are inbwteen sizes I would definitely order down!
Love the shade of pink it came in. Good quality material, not sheer, not too thick but definitely has some weight to it. Comfortable, good length in the pants. Could've sized down to a medium though.

This set is very comfortable!  The fit is loose and casual.  The fabric is heavier than I expected, but not too heavy.  It is warmer than you might think. I find this set to be very comfortable.  Check the sizing though.  It runs larger I than expected.
